comments: Assignments are easy. May be one or two lectures that are interesting. A lot of others can be interesting but irrelevant.
Covers a broad range of subjects that are applicable to many areas of research. Good practice in grant writing
This class gives a very basic overview of toxicology principles including general biology learned in high school and basic pharmacology and pathophysiology.
Very broad overview of toxicology, some lectures are more captivating than others.
it is a great way to learn about toxicology from the best toxicologists in the world.
